translation: Far lower than the Yoga of wisdom is action, O Arjuna. Seek thou refuge in wisdom; wretched are those whose motive is the fruit.
commentary: 2.49 far by far? Hi indeed? inferior inferior? Karma action or work? from the Yoga of wisdom than the Yoga of wisdom? Dhananjaya O Dhananjaya? Buddhau in wisdom? Sharanam refuge? Search seek? Wretched wretched? Phalahetavah seekers after fruits.Commentary Action done with evenness of mind is Yoga of wisdom.
